import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Client} from "src/app/components/services/client"; import {ClientService} from "src/app/components/services/client.service"; import {HttpErrorResponse} from "@angular/common/http"; @Component({ selector: 'app-clients', templateUrl: './clients.component.html', styleUrls: ['./clients.component.css'], }) export class ClientsComponent implements OnInit { public clients: Client[] | undefined; constructor(private clientService: ClientService){ } ngOnInit() { this.getClients(); } public getClients(): void { this.clientService.getClients().subscribe( (response: Client[]) => { this.clients = response; }, (error: HttpErrorResponse) =>{ alert(error.message); } ); } }
